channel.title: What now?
channel.description: Okay ive follow The souls tut on how to make a server. ive done all what he said/wrote. But what now?? I have opened the compiler and it running. but when i try to log into the server, it says error connecting to server. ? i dunno if i need one step more :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: What now?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

phoenix123:

i had, but i think i did it wrong. ill try 2 find more tuts in portforward

you could use utorrent.

Read full topic

item.title: What now?
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

[quote=“Digital Hotdogs, post:11, topic:260003”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=343306.msg2652068#msg2652068 date=1233591684]
if you make a ip, every1 can connect aslong as ur run.bat is open. including your self.
[/quote]Haha I’ve had enough of replying to a moron. You cannot connect to your own no-ip, you will have to use one of the listed that you quoted.[/quote]
Phoenix, you need to portforward because I know you haven’t as I couldn’t connect to your server.

Read full topic

item.title: What now?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Digital Hotdogs, post:1, topic:260007”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=343306.msg2652045#msg2652045 date=1233590566]

No advertising, you will most likely get a mute for it.
I would remove the IP now. With the IP you made, you can only login with 127.0.0.1/ /0.0.0.0/Localhost/Computers name.

when u make a ip, you can use the ip you made to login OR you can still use 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 to login.
[/quote]Nope sorry can’t use your own IP to login
Say if I made 555Digital555.no-ip.info I wouldn’t be able to log into it. Only the ones I listed above that you quoted.[/quote]

l2login. try it because i have and iv done it plenty of times and its worked.

Read full topic

item.title: What now?

item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Digital Hotdogs, post:5, topic:260003”]No advertising, you will most likely get a mute for it.
I would remove the IP now. With the IP you made, you can only login with 127.0.0.1/ /0.0.0.0/Localhost/Computers name.[/quote]

when u make a ip, you can use the ip you made to login OR you can still use 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 to login.

item.title: What now?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

you also have to use 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 to login to the server.

once you want to put live, you will need to portfoward or use utorrent, both the same thing. utorrent is easier.

u also need to make a ip from no-ip and use the ip to login.

Read full topic

item.title: What now?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

i can tell your new.

  1. you need to open run.bat not the compiler.
  2. the compiler is for compiling your server, if you have done any updates.
  3. login.

Read full topic
